name: 6Shooter.
description:
A game made for the GMTK (Game Maker's Tool Kit) Game Jam.

6:56 version - can't pick up the ammo or destroy one of the targets.

7:30 version - can't pick up the ammo but you can destroy the target you couldn't before.

Will probably continue developing the idea and see where it goes.

Dev'd by Skylaark and MeekiBriks.
